title: Theresa Tam issues new guidance on the wearing of masks, but says there are some caveats to keep in mind - The Globe and Mail
description: Theresa Tam issues new guidance on the wearing of masks, but says there are some caveats to keep in mind The Globe and Mail Global National: April 6, 2020 | 3M reaches deal on respirator masks for Canada Global News The COVID-19 advice around masks has change…
content:
Chief Public Health Officer Theresa Tam issued new guidance on the wearing of masks in public during a news conference in Ottawa, Monday April 6, 2020. 
Adrian Wyld/The Canadian Press
